name: Senior Python/Django developer
description:
Maxiru is a boutique IT company offering custom-tailored solutions development for the travel and hospitality industries. We are looking for Senior Python/Django developers to join our experienced team in creating travel tech and hospitality solutions. Interesting projects are just starting up, no legacy code and maintenance.

Responsibilities:

  • Architect optimal solutions given business requirements
  • Design and develop API using Django framework
  • Mentor and review teammates code
  • Model and design data bases
  • Participate in meetings with the team, English speaking partners and clients
  • Help with tasks’ estimation
  • Sync with PM on risks and solutions
  • Support releases and resolve urgent issues

Requirements:

  • 4+ years of commercial backend development experience
  • Experience with Celery
  • Hands on experience with Django и orm
  • Comfortable in verbal and written English communication
  • Availability during EST (UTC -5) business hours
  • Comfortable working as a contractor

Would be a plus
You have experience in mentoring one to two less skilled developers.

Our benefits

  • World-class software development
  • Fully remote environment and mindset (we have been remote from the start)
  • Opportunity to work on projects for the famous travel and hospitality industry companies
  • Open-minded management and collaborative environment
  • Competitive compensation
  • Paid sick and vacation days
